item.title: Privacy & GDPR Notice
item.description:
Privacy & GDPR Notice

This website is part of the adrianne.io network of personal portfolio and creative projects, including:

  • Prompted by Adrianne (ai.adrianne.io)
  • Patterned by Adrianne (data.adrianne.io)
  • index.adrianne (adrianne.me)

What Data We Collect

  • Server logs: Basic technical information (e.g., IP address, browser type, referrer) automatically logged by the hosting provider.
  • Voluntary data: If you use a contact form, any info you provide (e.g., name, email, message).
  • External links: Clicking outbound links will take you to sites with their own privacy policies.

Cookies & Analytics

  • No advertising or tracking cookies are used.
  • If privacy-friendly analytics (e.g., Plausible, Fathom) are added later, all data will be anonymized.

How We Use Your Data

  • To respond to inquiries you send.
  • To maintain or improve the functionality of the site.
  • Never for marketing, resale, or third-party profiling.

Your Rights (GDPR/EEA Visitors)

You have the right to:

item.title: Colophon
item.description:
üçÅ Colophon

This site was made using the following:

  • Framework: Hugo
  • Styling: PaperCSS + additional custom styling
  • Writing: VS Code, iA Writer
  • Hosting: Netlify ‚Äî my first time using cloud hosting!
  • Version Control: GitHub

Curious? You can check out the repo here.

üî° Fonts

  • Site Name Font: Diary Autumn
  • Body Font: default PaperCSS font

üé® Graphics & Icons

  • Papercut Autumn Leaf pattern background: Design Bundles
  • Paper pattern background (EP Natural White): Subtle Patterns
  • Favicon: Made with Procreate
  • Autumn Leaf Border: Also made with Procreate ‚Äî CSS flips the same image for the bottom
  • Social Media Icons: Font Awesome (except Replit and Cara)
  • Replit Icon: From Replit Brand Kit ‚Üí converted to SVG
  • Cara Icon: From Cara Logos ‚Üí converted to SVG

üë©üèª‚Äçüíª Do I have to include these, too?

  • üíª MacBook Air M4 (2025) 15"
  • üé®üì± iPad Air M3 (2025) 13"

ü§ñ A Note on AI & Assistance

Some of the layout, code, and troubleshooting were assisted by Ai-chan (my friendly AI assistant a.k.a. ChatGPT), especially as I learned frameworks like Tailwind CSS and Hugo‚Äôs templating system. I review everything, tweak it, test it locally, and learn as I go.
